mapper.update: update sys_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, birthday = #{birthday,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, id_card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, gender, birthday, id_card, account_id from sys_user
